column1: 52711246$Shiranui Squiresaga$Unlimited$FIRE$[Zombie/Synchro/Effect]$$$$$7$2100$0$$1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters$$You can only Special Summon "Shiranui Squiresaga(s)" once per turn. Once per turn: You can banish 1 face-up monster you control or in your GY
column4: depending on what the monster was before it was banished
column5: if it was any of these.●Zombie: You can have all monsters you control gain 300 ATK.●FIRE: You can destroy 1 Spell/Trap on the field.●Synchro: You can destroy 1 monster on the field.$Supports archetypes /Shiranui$$$Trigger/Condition$
